title: Frailty trends in Catalonia 2017–2021: An epidemiological study with 1.5 million people aged ≥65 years
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 237

Author(s): Mateu Serra-Prat, Ma Rosario Moreno-Carmona, Aida Fortuny, Àngel Lavado, Mònica Papiol, Laura Muñoz, Juan Francisco Martínez-Cerdá, Júlia Serra-Colomer, Emili Burdoy, Mateu Cabré
